title: Beaver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Gnaw at the rivers barricade at night. You have 1 charge.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: The floodgates will open. The next day, everyone stays home and cannot talk, vote or whisper.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Do not let any lynches happen for 3 days in a row.

desc:
Post 340
*How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?*
